name: The Ultimate Noah's Ark
overview: The Ultimate Noah's Ark is a digital version of the picture-book of the same name by artist Mike Wilks. Like the book the player is presented with a large drawing of Noah's Ark. On the Ark are 354 different animal species to be found. All but one of them have a mate. It's up to the user to find which animal is missing his mate. The original drawing can be broken up into 256 different screen-wide detail close-ups. In addition to the drawing this software title comes with additional information for all the animals including videos of them in their natural habitats.
